name: Train Chase
description:
You escaped on a train, but the evil corporation is still chasing you. Defeat waves of enemies in a low-poly environment on a train with several of different weapons.
Train Chase is a Wave Shooter optimized for VR, but playable with PC Hardware or Gamepad too.

Dodge incoming Bullets



Time slows down before a bullet hits you.
Use this to your advantage to dodge any Bullet.

Fight various enemies



From Drones to Cars to Stationary Guns, a variety of enemies are chasing after you and you have to defeat them.

Pickup weapons



At the start of each wave there can be a drop of a weapon in front of you.
Do not waste your ammunition, otherwise your only way of attacking will be your fists.
